name: Elevator Space Action
description:
This project was an attempt to combine two games I enjoy: Heat Signature, a roguelike emergent-gameplay filled top down space action game, and Elevator Action, am arcade game where you descend buildings using elevators while fighting people. The ‘ships’ that would be found throughout the game were going to be skyscrapers with rockets strapped to them, hence the elevators. Despite what the preview may look like, this was a side-on perspective platformer, like elevator action. Most of the time in this project went towards procedurally generating the buildings/ships. This is on hiatus which is probably indefinite.

Controls:

WASD: Movement

E: Interact
